name: Shadowmane Stalker

physical_description.appearance: A large feline predator with midnight-black fur that seems to absorb light. Its mane flows like living shadow, and its eyes glow with a pale blue light.
distinguishing_features: Claws that can cut through mystical barriers

abilities.name: Shadow Step
abilities.description: Can briefly become incorporeal and move through shadows

abilities.name: Mystical Tracking
abilities.description: Can track prey across mystical barriers and dimensional boundaries

abilities.name: Silence Aura
abilities.description: Moves without making any sound, even on noisy surfaces

habitat.territorial_behavior: Marks territory with shadow-essence, highly territorial

lore_significance: Shadowmane Stalkers are examples of how monsters can achieve significant mystical abilities while remaining limited by the two-divine-influence barrier. They serve as a reminder that power alone does not grant the transcendent potential of humanoids.
